name: Eye_Death
_source: speak;Bramar;Do... do all spirits sound so hurt?|i know we are pummeling it to death{w} but this is making me uncomfortable.
speak;Nelad;Spirits should be able to talk like us, this one has been corrupted by some sort of unbalance of its domain
speak;Bramar;At least it dies like any beast, one less problem to think about.

speak;Nelad;You should respect spirits, even violent ones, they are the ones that keep the world in shape. Unless we fix whatever is causing this they will keep appearing, and i fear the next ones will not be as easy as a small village spirit.
